text:
Hello everyone!
is there a way to use REST APIs to my own server to display some data in UI Extensions/Extension files ?
This keeps happening on booking meeting. Any update for a fix on this? Also saw similar <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Sales-Hub-Tools/Meeting-scheduler-giving-random-error/m-p/673997> post here

Hello everyone,
there is a redundant "body_content" category in this list
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/configuration#categories>

In many HubSpot site I am seeing console error like

```<http://localhost:1442/check-if-local-dev-server>```
and not sure from where this is coming from. anyone has any idea?

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
